metadata.name: Workflow for: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shan...
metadata.description: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shanghai with high cost performance, preferably departing in the afternoon.
metadata.question_pattern: Help book a flight ticket from Los Angeles to Shanghai with high cost performance, preferably departing in the afternoon.

nodes.name: flight_search
nodes.description: Search for flight options and prices from Los Angeles to Shanghai.

nodes.name: cost_analysis
nodes.description: Analyze the matched flight options for cost performance.

nodes.name: user_query
nodes.description: Ask the user for their preferred travel date.

nodes.name: flight_booking
nodes.description: Book the selected flight ticket based on user confirmation.
